name: Video Quest
description:
Get ready for VIDEO QUEST! Battle killer robots and computer infused plants in a post apocalyptic wasteland to return your overdue VHS tape before the last known video store on Earth revokes your video rental privileges FOREVER!

Search through the wasteland for 'VIDEO QUEST', the last remaining rental store on Earth and return your late tape. Collect other VHS tapes along the way to power up and fight whatever the wasteland throws at you. Collect toy robots and cassette tapes too, just because.

Feel free to let me know of any issues you might run into while playing. And thanks for taking a look!
